movie.title: Wassup Rockers
movie.writer: Larry Clark (screenplay), Larry Clark (story), Matthew Frost (story)
movie.actors: Jonathan Velasquez, Francisco Pedrasa, Milton Velasquez, Usvaldo Panameno
movie.plot: Instead of adhering to the norms of their South Central neighborhood, a group of skater boys opt to bus into Hollywood and Beverly Hills, where they attract local rich girls - and plenty of trouble with the police, jealous boyfriends, and nervous parents.
movie.tomatoConsensus: As usual with Clark's films, the fixation on kids is rather creepy, plus the plot eventually runs off the rails into camp.
